name: Video Pong
description:
This is pretty much a Pong Clone but with 3 Variations including Classic Pong, Pong Soccer and Pong Hockey. You use the mouse to move the left Paddle Up or down and try to get the ball to your opponent's side of the screen. The game runs for 2 minutes and whoever has the highest score wins.

Mouse = Move Paddle

Escape = Exit the Game

F1 = View Manual

F2 = Reset the game

F3 = Change Game Variation

F4 = Change Window Size

F5 = Save Game

F6 = Load Game
